txt.en: It is uncertain whether these worms are native to Forochel or whether they have come down from the northern waste-land during the winter when the Ice Bay is frozen solid enough to travel across. Of course, it no longer matters from whence they came, for they are here now and a threat to all who live in Forochel.

As it turns out, the cold up in Forochel is not that bad once you get used to it, or so the Lossoth say -- unfortunately, you are pretty sure you will never get used to it no matter how many of these accursed worms you manage to kill. It certainly does not seem to bring much cheer to this warmth-forsaken land in any case.
